name: Text Blaze
headline: Slash commands anywhere
description: Text Blaze saves time and increases comms quality by automating repeated tasks. Users save smart templates and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Templates can include placeholders, logic, dynamic fields, integrations with other apps, and more.

# [![Logo](https://blaze.today/images/logo.png) Text Blaze](https://blaze.today/</>)
[Add to Chrome – It's Free!](https://blaze.today/<>)
[Add Text Blaze to Chrome – It's Free!](https://blaze.today/<>)
# Eliminate repetitive typing and mistakes.
## Easy-to-use templates with endless customizability and powerful automation.
## All with full control at your fingertips.
[Download Extension – It's Free!](https://blaze.today/<https:/chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/text-blaze-templates-and/idgadaccgipmpannjkmfddolnnhmeklj?hl=en-US>) [Go to Dashboard](https://blaze.today/<https:/dashboard.blaze.today>) [Schedule a demo](https://blaze.today/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/dan-barak/text-blaze-demo>)
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1,400+ Chrome Web Store reviews500,000+ people use Text Blaze to end repetitive typing
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
This saves me so much time! I love how easy it is to use.
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/donna_w.jpg)| Donna WChrome Web Store  
---|---  
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Such a great app! Time saver and best of all works across devices.
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/jay_k.jpg)| Jay K.Chrome Web Store  
---|---  
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
A freaking mazing !! Can't live without it, best thing ever.
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/mae_s.jpg)| Mae S.Chrome Web Store  
---|---  
# Text Blaze saves top users over **28 hours** per month
That’s over $10,000 a year in savings because of productivity improvements
![Graph!](https://blaze.today/images/panda/graph.png)
7 Billion
Characters are typed per month using Text Blaze
11X
Avg. productivity increase when a snippet is used
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Rating on the Chrome Webstore
Based on actual user results. Assumes a 200 characters per minute typing speed and a $30 value per hour saved. Top users are users who are in the top 10% of Text Blaze usage.
## How it works
1
Add to Desktop
Text Blaze works as a [Chrome Extension](https://blaze.today/<https:/chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/text-blaze/idgadaccgipmpannjkmfddolnnhmeklj>), [macOS app](https://blaze.today/</mac/>), or [Windows app](https://blaze.today/</windows/>). It only takes a few clicks to get started!
2
Save any text as a snippet and give it a shortcut.
Do you have a response you repeat often? Create a snippet for it! For example /ty for a thank you sentence.
3
Type the shortcut to insert your snippet wherever you are.
Text Blaze works on Gmail, Google Docs, LinkedIn, Salesforce and in all your favorite apps.
## The most versatile way to speed up typing on Chrome
![Demo](https://blaze.today/images/steps/tb.png)
![](https://blaze.today/images/numbers/bullet-1.svg) 1
Save any "snippet" of text in Text Blaze as a template and give it a shortcut.
Use whatever feels natural for your shortcuts. You could try /ty for a thank you sentence.
![Demo](https://blaze.today/images/steps/anim.gif)
![](https://blaze.today/images/numbers/bullet-2.svg) 2
Type the shortcut and the snippet text will be substituted for it wherever you are in Chrome.
Text Blaze works on Gmail, Google Docs, LinkedIn, Salesforce and wherever else you may be.
![](https://blaze.today/images/numbers/bullet-3.svg) 3
Take advantage of sharing and collaboration features and the most versatile dynamic templates in any app.
![Pointing!](https://blaze.today/images/panda/pointing-reversed.png)
## Dynamic Templates
Take advantage of Text Blaze's **forms, dynamic formulas, and integrations with other sites** to simplify your day with Text Blaze. Reduce the number of tools you juggle and blaze through your work.
![Forms Screenshot](https://blaze.today/images/anim_form.webp)
![Sharing Screenshot](https://blaze.today/images/share.png)
## Sharing and Collaboration
Once you've created your snippets, **share them with your colleagues**. They'll immediately update with any improvements you make and you can even edit them together.
# Great for individuals...
### Insert Snippets and Templates
Speed up your work and maximize your productivity by using templates and snippets. "Auto text", "text expander", "snippets", "macros", "canned responses" – whatever you call it, the Text Blaze Chrome Extension is the best way to do it.
### Your Personal Assistant
Create [forms](https://blaze.today/</guides/forms/>) with blank fields to easily fill in a name or other data each time you use a snippet. Use [dynamic formulas](https://blaze.today/</commands/formula/>) to calculate values like taxes on the fly. [Simulate clicks or key presses](https://blaze.today/</guides/autopilot/>) to automate parts of your workflow.
### Create Consistent Processes Anywhere
Use [forms](https://blaze.today/</guides/forms/>), [dynamic formulas](https://blaze.today/</commands/formula/>) and [integrations](https://blaze.today/</commands/urlload/>) with other websites to define your team's repeatable processes using Text Blaze. You can even save form data and trigger follow up actions every time a snippet is used.
# ...and it completely crushes it in teams ![We love Teams!](https://blaze.today/images/teams.png)
### Collect and Share Your Most Effective Messages
If you work with a team, Text Blaze can be a central database of your most effective emails, chats and other messages. Just create a [shared folder](https://blaze.today/<https:/blaze.today/guides/sharing/>) and you can continually improve it together.
### Works Everywhere You Work
Gmail, Google Docs, Office 365, Salesforce, Blackboard, Epic or any other site. Wherever you are in Chrome, the Text Blaze Chrome Extension is there to help you. If you ever find a site where Text Blaze doesn't work, let us know and we'll get it fixed ASAP.
### A Better Way to Keep your Messages Consistent
Using a shared snippet folder, your team will always be hitting the exactly right notes in your messaging. Everyone's snippets are updated automatically when changes are made, so everyone is always on the same page.
## Trusted and loved **❤️** by users at
![AirBnb logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/airbnb.svg)
![Revolut logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/revolut.svg)
![Booking.com logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/bookingcom.svg)
![Google logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/google.svg)
![Redfin logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/redfin.svg)
![GrubHub logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/grubhub.svg)
![Salesforce logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/salesforce.svg)
![Indeed logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/indeed.svg)
![uber logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/uber.svg)
![DocuSign logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/docusign.svg)
![Lyft logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/lyft.svg)
![Hubspot logo](https://blaze.today/images/logos/hubspot.svg)
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Wow! What an incredible time saver. I've been looking for something like this for the longest. So grateful for Text Blaze!!!
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/stephanie_m.jpg)
Stephanie M
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Excellent! I use Text Blaze every day and it's easily one of the best Chrome extensions in my collection. It works everywhere, is very reliable, and very simple to use. Highly recommended.
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/brian_h.gif)
Brian H
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Extremely useful for speeding up note taking in my therapy practice... I've tried a number of autotext extensions and this is hands down the best.
![User Profile](https://blaze.today/images/testimonials/tony_l.jpg)
Tony L
![We love these reviews!](https://blaze.today/images/panda/love.png)
## Unleash your productivity and get more done with Text Blaze.

generated_description:
**Text Blaze Overview**

Text Blaze is a productivity-focused startup founded in 2019 and located in San Francisco, part of Y Combinator's W21 batch. Their mission is straightforward but powerful: to enable users to use slash commands anywhere. The tool aims to save time and enhance communication quality by automating repetitive tasks. 

**How It Works**  
Text Blaze allows users to create "snippets"—smart templates that can be saved and deployed anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. These snippets can contain placeholders, logic, and dynamic fields, and they can integrate with other applications, greatly streamlining workflows. Imagine typing "/ty" to insert a previously saved thank-you note—simple, right?

**Key Features**  
You’ll find three main products within Text Blaze:
- **Snippets and Templates**: Easily create reusable pieces of text.
- **Blaze AI**: Automated writing and editing help, elevating your writing efficiency.
- **Data Blaze**: Manage tables and sheets efficiently.

On top of that, Text Blaze supports collaboration, enabling teams to share snippets and keep everyone aligned with consistent messaging. It’s not just a tool for individual productivity—it’s a game-changer for teams.

**Why Users Love It**  
With over 500,000 users and a strong presence on the Chrome Web Store (where it boasts a 5-star rating from 1,400+ reviews), Text Blaze users report that they save over **28 hours each month** through improved productivity. That's significant—translating to about $10,000 in time savings annually for the top users!

**Team and Leadership**  
Text Blaze operates with a lean team of 9, showcasing the agility and focus typical of tech startups. Jared Friedman serves as a Group Partner, guiding their growth and development.

**Use Cases**  
Text Blaze is perfect for a variety of sectors:
- **Sales**: Quickly insert tailored responses for potential customers.
- **Healthcare**: Streamline patient communications and update records.
- **Education**: Provide consistent messages to students and parents.
Additionally, it's equally valuable for individual professionals looking to enhance their productivity.

**Final Thoughts**  
At its core, Text Blaze is about reducing the friction in communication and workflow. It's a tool that not only saves time but empowers users to communicate more effectively, whether on Gmail, Google Docs, or any other web-based platform. If you're looking to eliminate repetitive typing and streamline your processes, Text Blaze might just be the productivity buddy you need.

For more details, visit their [website](https://blaze.today).
